author: admin
title: Weather: Summer returns tomorrow - High temperatures expected by Monday - ProtoThema English
text: After the storms, the weather officially changes from tomorrow, Saturday, July 6, with winds – winds in the Aegean – and some heat, more in the west. Today it may rain briefly and a lot locally in eastern Sterea at noon. The temperature will rise a little in Athens to 33 34 degrees, 36 degrees in the west, while north winds in the Aegean Sea will be at 6 and from the afternoon at 7 Beaufort. In the next few days, practically the whole new week, the weather will roll with winds of up to 7 Beaufort in the Aegean and more heat in western Greece, where the beneficial effect of the wind will not be enough. In fact, from Monday, the thermometer will reach and briefly exceed 40 degrees in certain geographical areas. In Attica, the mercury will remain at 37 degrees in the new week, in Thessaloniki at 35-36 degrees. Analytical forecast: What the weather will be like today & over the weekend Today, Friday, no rain is forecast. The winds will blow N-NW with an intensity of 4 to 5 Beaufort and in some places in the Aegean Sea 6 Beaufort. The temperature will be close to normal for the season. On the weekend (6-7/7), sunshine is forecasted. Northern winds in the Aegean will reach 7 Beaufort and the temperature in the Ionian Sea and mainland Greece will rise. TODAY FRIDAY In eastern Central Greece, Evia, Sporades and Crete, partly cloudy with some local rain until midday. In the rest of the regions the weather will be generally clear and only in the midday and afternoon hours clouds will develop on the mainland. The winds will blow north-northwest 3 to 5 Beaufort and in the Aegean Sea 6 and gradually and occasionally 7 Beaufort. The temperature will rise slightly mainly in the west and north and will reach 33 to 35, locally 36 degrees Celsius on the mainland and 30 to 33 degrees Celsius on the islands. TOMORROW SATURDAY 06-07-2024 Weather is generally clear with occasional clouds in the afternoon and evening hours in the mountainous areas of the mainland. Winds will blow from the north, in the west 3 to 5 and in the east 4 to 6 and locally in the Aegean Sea 7 Beaufort. The temperature will rise slightly, mainly in the west. It will reach 34 to 36 degrees in the mainland and the Ionian islands and 37 degrees in some places in the western mainland. In the rest of the island country 29 to 31 degrees Celsius and in places in southern Crete 32 to 33 degrees Celsius. SUNDAY 07-07-2024 Generally clear weather with a few clouds in the afternoon and evening hours in the mountains of the northwestern part of the country. Winds will blow from the north at 4 to 6 Beaufort and locally in the Aegean Sea at 7 Beaufort. The temperature will rise slightly further. It will reach 36 to 38 degrees Celsius in the Ionian Sea and in the mainland and in some places in the mainland 39 degrees Celsius. In the rest of the island country 30 to 33 degrees Celsius and in places on the eastern Aegean islands, the Dodecanese and southern Crete 33 to 35 degrees Celsius. MONDAY 08-07-2024 Generally clear weather with a few clouds in the afternoon and evening hours in the northern and central continental mountains where local rainfall is possible. Winds will blow from the north 4 to 6 and locally in the Aegean Sea 7 Beaufort. The temperature will rise slightly in the west and north. The weather will improve in the south of the country.

author: newsdirectory3
title: Russian Elite Forces Suffer Crushing Blow: Budanov’s Victory Turns to Ashes in Volchansk
text:
/Pogled.info/ The ruins of the aggregate factory in Volchansk have become a mass grave for elite GUR fighters. Literally the next day, after the Ukrainian fighters boasted that they had “taken over” the ruins, the Russians unleashed a deadly storm against them, and the victory immediately turned into a disaster with only one shot from Solntsepok. Budanov’s* elite burned completely.
For a long time, our fighters defended the plant for aggregates in Volchansk. Today, only ruins remain of the once thriving factory. Military correspondent Yuriy Kotenok noted that our units are actually semi-surrounded here – surrounded by fire.
The enemy, who are many times more numerous than us with UAVs, including FPV drones, had the advantage, the positions broke forward, “nightmares” them, the military correspondent wrote on his Telegram channel. – The right decision was made to leave these unfavorable positions. I think it’s the right decision.
As soon as our men left the ruins, soldiers from the Main Intelligence Directorate of Ukraine (GUR) arrived there. Photos and videos of the alleged captured plant immediately spread across Ukrainian public pages and media. It was noted that the “special operation” was almost approved by the head of the GUR Kiril Budanov * himself, in order to reestablish himself after a series of defeats by the Russian troops.
Photo: collage from Tsargrad
Generally, peremoga peremog (victory of victories – Ukrainian) is served. Military expert Alexander Ivanovov noted that “clouds are clearly gathering over Budanov *” recently, and Zelensky even suspected him of “covert fighting and working for several masters at the same time”.
This “operation” coincided perfectly with Zelensky’s stay in the USA, which he himself mentioned as the main “victory” of this autumn,- quotations the expert from aif.ru.
But in the end, victory turned into zrada (betrayal – Ukrainian) literally with one shot from Solntsepok. At night, our elite boys burned Budanov * in the ruins of a factory in Volchansk.
Yesterday they expelled us from this plant, well, we bring them there and … (punishment – obscenity), – pointed out the Russian fighters.
Screenshot t.me/SolovievLive
Military Chronicle analysts write:
“As soon as the units of the GUR entered the territory of the plant for aggregates in Volchansk, “Solntsepiok” began to attack the building complex.
The blogger Kiril Fedorov noted that Budanov’s elite * was dissolved by “Solntsepek” not only in the factory, but also in the residential areas. He had no chance of escaping alive after being hit by a 220 mm incendiary rocket.
And then at the Ukrainian Armed Forces base in Volchansk, our men shot down three FAB-1500s with UMPC.
They are buried GUR under the ruins of the houses, – wrote VGTRK reporter Andrey Rudenko.
And the Telegram channel “Military Informator” notes that our troops hit the ruins of the factory in Volchansk with thermobaric weapons at night.
* Kirill Budanov is included in Russia’s list of terrorists and extremists.
Translation: PI

author: Get News
title: Providing Excellent HGV Driver Training Courses | FinancialContent Business Page
text:
Taking driving lessons on a professional level sharpens one’s driving skills and prepares one for various situations on the road. Through driver training centres as well, aspiring drivers can be well-equipped for licence acquisition exams, which give them access to a rewarding career. This makes it crucial that drivers who want to become trusted professionals must find top-level driver training platforms.
In the United Kingdom, HGVT is a leading driver training centre that has been around for years. The driver training academy has helped numerous drivers achieve their driver goals and dreams. Their platform also serves as a solution to the challenges many companies face with training their drivers. They have the tools and resources to adequately prepare drivers for their licence acquisition exams. Thus, their licence certification training programmes are available for CAT C+E/CLASS 1, CAT C1, CAT C/CLASS 2, and CPC certification training.
High-end Driver Training Programmes
As a well-recognised driver training platform, HGVT provides standard training programmes and courses. The driver training academy focuses on the needs and requirements of its students. Hence, they offer them training sessions that address various matters within driving professionally. These sessions cover theoretical and practical topics.
An HGVT spokesman commented, “Our training techniques are of industry standard. We do our best not to offer our students less than what is expected to help them pass their licence acquisition exams. We are always on the edge to equip and provide them with all the knowledge they need to come out with outstanding results.”
“Seamless and Achievable Steps to becoming an HGV Driver in the UK”
The UK is filled with several companies that are looking for HGV drivers. HGVT provides its student drivers with all the clarity and answers they need regarding the HGV industry. They offer fast, affordable, and quality training programmes. There are different licence training programme categories available on their platform, and they are focused on making drivers more valuable to their company or employers. Therefore, people who want to learn more about how to become a HGV driver in the UK can contact HGVT.
The spokesperson added, “Getting your HGV licence comes with no hassle when you register under our training centre. Of course, there are defined steps to this, but you can rest assured that you will go through them seamlessly with our support. Professional drivers must pass their medical exam, as it is part of their training. It is to confirm that no medical conditions are impeding anyone from driving with no issues once they have passed their test.”
Standard HGV Licence Training Course
At HGVT, they have well-trained instructors who can handle their HGV licence training course . This course trains drivers to be proactive and helps them build the capacity to adapt to the various challenges that come with driving professionally.
Organisations and individuals who need more information about HGVT training offerings and packages in the UK can make consultations through their website – www.hgvt.co.uk, anytime.
